summary:
As a tech lead and enthusiast, I am currently working at Māia Insurance. Our company specializes in building a fully digital B2B platform for Dutch entrepreneurs to unburden them in all their insurance activities. We recognize that insurances can be a hassle, especially when it comes to filing claims with proof or up- or downgrading a company insurance. Our platform is designed to simplify and streamline these processes, while offering transparent coverage at a 20% lower price.

As the person responsible for the customer-side of our platform, I co-build and lead the team that builds it. I have extensive experience in team management, web development, serverless architecture, and cloud technology.

In addition to my work at Māia Insurance, I also share my story about sustainable and eco-friendly investing on my blog (written in Dutch). On the blog, I detail my personal results, share investment strategies, and provide helpful tips. If you're interested in learning more, check out my blog at https://linkslullenlinksvullen.substack.com/.

certifications.name: Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure
Google Apps: Product Essentials Exam for Sales
Google Search Appliance Qualified Deployment Specialist

projects.title: Irdeto - Implement Google Search Appliance
projects.description:
Irdeto and its affiliates have locations all over the world. Information is managed globally, but also locally at each location. Therefore Irdeto employees are struggling to find relevant information when it is needed. Irdeto is looking for a solution for their Enterprise Information issues, in order to improve the Information productivity at Irdeto. 

Irdeto started a project to implement the Google Search Appliance (GSA) as an Enterprise Search Engine (ESE) Solution to search across a number of content silos within Irdeto.
Fileshares
SharePoint
The HUB (SAP Jam)
Confluence

Users will be able to find relevant information using a user-friendly, familiar, single search box in a 
faster, more efficient manner. Furthermore, the GSA will help the you to identify and remove redundant or antiquated documentation.

projects.title: Renault Nederland - implementatie Google Search Appliance
projects.description: Renault Nederland wil een zoekfunctie op haar site implementeren om zodoende de conversie te verhogen. Hiervoor hebben wij de Google Search Appliance geimplementeerd als zoekoplossing voor de internetsite van www.renault.nl en op termijn ook Renault bedrijfswagen en Dacia.
